amendment.description: To provide additional funding for teacher quality programs under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 and the Higher Education Act of 1965 and for the Mathematics and Science Partnerships and the school leadership program under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.

action.text: Amendment SA 1613 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1613 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 43 - 51. Record Vote Number: 343.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1613.

Amendment SA 1613 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11290-11291, S11302; text: CR S11290) To provide additional funding for teacher quality programs under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 and the Higher Education Act of 1965 and for the Mathematics and Science Partnerships and the school leadership program under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1613 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 43 - 51. Record Vote Number: 343.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1613 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 1542.
